translations: 海军学校学生；英国海军少尉之候补军官

sentences.sentence: It was slow going at first, as Hurd found it difficult to recruit Masters and Midshipmen who were qualified for such technical work.
sentences.translation: 起初进展很慢，赫德发现很难找到胜任这一技术性工作的船长和见习船员。

sentences.sentence: One of my fellow midshipmen at the U. S. Naval Academy was performing poorly in class and reported to his company officer for counseling.
sentences.translation: 我们在美国海军学院军官候补生中有一个同伴，他的学业很差。
